tutorials.title: Lab 1: Provision an ADW instance
tutorials.description: Provision a new ADW instance and connect to the database

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Querying External Files
tutorials.description: Query files on the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Object Storage (OCI) directly without loading them to your database

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Machine Learning using OML
tutorials.description: Using the Oracle Machine Learning (OML) notebook application provided with ADWC

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Managing Monitoring
tutorials.description: Shows the monitoring capabilities available via the Cloud Console

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Scaling Performance in ADW
tutorials.description: Scale up your Oracle Autonomous Data Warehouse to have more CPUs.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Visualizations
tutorials.description: Connect Oracle Analytics Desktop to an Oracle autonomous database for visualiztions.
